game.title: Numicus
game.description: We make incredible fishing video games!

history.text: Mac graduated in business from the University of Oregon. He traveled world-wide as a developer and project manager for financial institutions. He created computer programs for multiple banks including those at the New York World Trade Center. After 911, he understood firsthand the value of time and family. He returned to Oregon, worked summers as a fly fishing guide. It has taken him five years working alone as an Indie developer bring to life virtual fly fishing on favorite rivers from Oregon to Montana.

Mac currently is programming a project using a MEAN stack living on Amazon’s Elastic Cloud. Working alone he also successfully completed the creation of a video game, Trophy Trout, using all aspects of what many consider the best game engine, Unreal. He is a qualified Facebook developer and contributes to an Unreal open source project, UE4Duino. He also has a keen interest in robotics with several active Arduino projects, some using quaternion equations. Trophy Trout and Mac may be found at launch time, June 14th, at E3 in Los Angels.
